newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian wool indicator falls 2c to 575c/kg.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian wool indicator falls 2c to 575c/kg.

text.p: The Australian wool market eastern indicator fell by 2.0 cents to 575 cents a kg clean at sales in Sydney and Geelong on Tuesday, Wool International (WI) said.
Merino fleece prices were mixed, with the 19 micron indicator 0.5 percent dearer and 20/21/25m up to 0.5 percent cheaper.
The 22m category was up to 0.5 percent dearer, 23m was unchanged, 24m 1.0 percent cheaper and 26m up to 1.5 percent cheaper, WI said.
In merino skirtings, 19m was slightly dearer and 20/21m generally unchanged.
